attributes.action: Please remove Gary Neville from Sky Sports
attributes.additional_details:
To Whom it may concern, We the undersigned demand that Mr Gary Neville be removed from any role with Sky Sports which brings him into contact with the viewing public.

He is not only the most visually challenged person known to the modern world, but also has the camera presence of a stuffed mere cat.

In the interests of the viewing public and Sky shareholders please remove him ASAP
